ygData.subject: Re: Cleric Brawlers
ygData.msgSnippet: I to love to change it up a bit  i am a 33rd level cleric and when fighting in unrest down at the ghost spirit in between ghost i will pull and tank a lot of
ygData.messageBody:
I to love to change it up a bit i am a 33rd level cleric and when
fighting in unrest down at the ghost spirit in between ghost i will pull
and tank a lot of the mobs i also pull a lot of festering hags which is
the most fun you may think i am crazy to pull a mob thast can kill me
in 3 spells but all i do is blast then divine works great and then the
rest of thegroup kills the hag very quickly.


-----Original Message-----
From: Squires, Dean [mailto:DeanSquires@...]
Sent: Monday, June 28, 1999 11:22 AM
To: 'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com'
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Cleric Brawlers


From: "Squires, Dean" <DeanSquires@...>

Just wanted to open a discussion on Clerics who love to fight. I am
happy being a cleric, but I cannot resist jumping into the heat of a
battle and kicking some back. I also like to occassionally tank. I try
to save all my mana for healing, but sometimes I just love to blast
away. This is probably because I feel useless when grouped as my
regular attack doesn't compare to others in the group. Anyone else feel
this way? Any experiences to share?

Baelstorm
10th Level
(Solusek Ro)
